trans-unit.source: Specifies a type to be passed to the <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write``1(System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceOptions,``0)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定要傳遞給 <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write``1(System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceOptions,``0)" /> 方法的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A> requires T to be an anonymous type or marked with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A> 使用需要匿名型別 T 或是<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the properties of `T` must be a supported property type; either a simple framework type such as <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Guid>, <xref:System.DateTime> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, or an array of primitive types.
trans-unit.target: 此外，屬性`T`必須支援的屬性類型，則為其中一個簡單的架構，例如輸入<xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Guid>，<xref:System.DateTime>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>，或陣列基本類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the name to apply to an event if the event type or property is not explicitly named.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱，如果沒有明確命名事件類型或屬性，則會將這個名稱套用至事件。

trans-unit.source: The name to apply to the event or property.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至事件或屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A>, passing `null` for `eventName`, the event name is automatically derived from <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute.Name%2A> or determined based on the name of type `T`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Write%2A>，並傳遞`null`如`eventName`，事件名稱會自動衍生自<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventDataAttribute.Name%2A>或判定根據型別名稱`T`。
